Question & Options:
Which songs from the movie 'Mera Rang De Basanti' are known for their patriotic themes and were well-rendered?
Options:
A. A) mera rang de basanti
B. B) sarfaroshi ki tamanna
C. C) mahive mahive
D. D) All of the above
Correct Answer: B) sarfaroshi ki tamanna, C) mahive mahive

Question & Options:

Options:
A. mera rang de basanti
B. sarfaroshi ki tamanna
C. mahive mahive
D. udit narayan

Which of the following statements are true regarding the songs and their composer in *The Legend of Bhagat Singh*?
Options:
A. A) 'sura so pahchaniye' and 'mera rang de basanti' are both intense tracks.
B. B) 'sarfaroshi ki tamanna' is known for its subdued tone.
C. C) All three songs convey a sense of patriotic fervour.
D. D) Ar Rahman created a softer tune for 'sarfaroshi ki tamanna'.
Correct Answer: A) 'sura so pahchaniye' and 'mera rang de basanti' are both intense tracks., C) All three songs convey a sense of patriotic fervour.

Question & Options:
Which songs from the album convey a patriotic fervour and received favourable reviews?
Options:
A. A) Sura So Pahchaniye
B. B) Mera Rang De Basanti
C. C) Sarfaroshi Ki Tamanna
D. D) Mahive Mahive
Correct Answer: B) Mera Rang De Basanti, C) Sarfaroshi Ki Tamanna

Question & Options:

Question & Options:

Options:
A. A) 'sura so pahchaniye' and 'mera rang de basanti' are both intense tracks.
B. B) 'sura so pahchaniye' and 'pagdi sambhal jatta' share a sombre mood.
C. C) Sukhwinder Singh performed 'mera rang de basanti'.
D. D) 'pagdi sambhal jatta' features vocals by Sukhwinder Singh.
